name: Shivaleela Uppula
title: Senior Conversational AI & GCP Vertex AI Platform Architect
professional_summary: I am having 10 years of experience in architecting enterprise-scale conversational AI platforms, specializing in Google Cloud Platform ecosystems with deep expertise in Vertex AI, Contact Center AI, and Generative AI solutions across regulated healthcare, insurance, and government domains.

Leveraging Google Cloud Platform Vertex AI Agent Engine and Dialogflow CX within Contact Center AI to architect a HIPAA-compliant multi-agent virtual assistant system for Medline Industries, orchestrating complex patient inquiry routing through GCP-based context management and slot filling with custom Healthcare entity extraction.

Implementing Google Cloud Platform Contact Center AI solutions for Blue Cross Blue Shield that integrated GCP Agent Assist functionality with existing CRM systems, reducing call handling time by optimizing intent detection models through systematic training and fine-tuning of transformer architectures on Vertex AI.

Designing scalable chatbot framework architectures on Google Cloud Platform using Vertex AI Pipelines for MLOPs workflows, incorporating GCP-powered Retrieval Augmented Generation patterns to ensure accurate insurance policy information retrieval while maintaining strict data governance protocols across Contact Center AI deployments.

Developing enterprise-grade conversational AI platforms with advanced natural language processing capabilities on Google Cloud Platform, utilizing Hugging Face libraries and PyTorch frameworks deployed on Vertex AI to enhance entity extraction and text summarization for healthcare documentation automation.

Engineering real-time data processing systems using Google Cloud Platform Pub/Sub and Cloud Functions to support live virtual agent interactions within Contact Center AI, ensuring millisecond response generation while maintaining compliance with healthcare regulatory requirements including HIPAA safeguards across all GCP services.

Building custom LLM deployment pipelines on Google Cloud Platform Vertex AI with advanced GCP monitoring and logging implementations, creating model versioning systems that tracked performance metrics across insurance claim processing conversational flows with automated rollback capabilities within Contact Center AI environments.

Architecting cloud-native application development patterns utilizing Google Cloud Platform Cloud Run and Kubernetes orchestration for Contact Center AI deployments, designing containerized microservices for rich fulfillment implementations that integrated with legacy healthcare systems through REST API and gRPC interfaces.

Establishing MLOps best practices through comprehensive CI/CD pipelines using Git and Docker on Google Cloud Platform, automating training workflows for Dialogflow ES agents within Contact Center AI while implementing rigorous evaluation frameworks to test conversational agent performance against insurance industry benchmarks.

Leading cross-functional collaborations with product and business teams to translate complex healthcare compliance requirements into technical specifications for virtual agent development on Google Cloud Platform, documenting AI pipeline architectures for audit trails and regulatory submissions across Contact Center AI implementations.

Optimizing Google Cloud Platform cost management strategies for large-scale AI workloads on GCP services supporting Contact Center AI, implementing analytics and reporting dashboards using BigQuery to monitor Vertex AI usage patterns and recommend resource allocation adjustments for budget adherence.

Pioneering Generative AI integration within existing Google Cloud Platform Contact Center AI infrastructure, leveraging Gemini frameworks deployed on Vertex AI to enhance response generation capabilities while maintaining secure API integration protocols for protected health information processing across GCP services.

Creating comprehensive training programs for transformer model fine-tuning specific to healthcare terminology on Google Cloud Platform, developing custom datasets from medical literature to improve intent classification accuracy for patient symptom description parsing in virtual triage systems within Contact Center AI.

Designing secure knowledge base integration patterns for insurance policy documentation using Google Cloud Platform services, implementing hybrid search-retrieval systems that combined traditional SQL queries with semantic search through custom-deployed LLMs on Vertex AI endpoints supporting Contact Center AI operations.

Developing performance optimization strategies for chat systems handling concurrent healthcare provider inquiries on Google Cloud Platform, implementing caching mechanisms and load balancing across GCP Cloud Run instances to maintain sub-second latency during peak utilization periods within Contact Center AI deployments.

Establishing production support protocols for AI workloads in 24/7 healthcare environments using Google Cloud Platform services, creating automated alerting systems through GCP Cloud Monitoring that triggered escalation procedures for model performance degradation or system availability issues across Contact Center AI implementations.

Implementing advanced context management systems for longitudinal patient interactions on Google Cloud Platform, designing state persistence mechanisms using GCP Cloud Storage and Firestore that maintained conversation history across multiple virtual agent sessions while ensuring data privacy compliance within Contact Center AI.

Leading technical architecture decisions for enterprise chatbot deployments on Google Cloud Platform, evaluating trade-offs between Dialogflow CX and custom Agent Development Kit implementations based on specific healthcare use case requirements and existing Contact Center AI infrastructure constraints across GCP services.
